title: Ojisan wa Kawaii Mono ga Osuki.
original_name: おじさんはカワイイものがお好き。
sinopse:
Mitsutaka Oji is a 40-year-old, handsome office worker that is admired by his colleagues. Of course, he has a secret he is trying to hide from everyone: he loves cute things. But with his son going to his apartment, Mitsutaka's secret is now in danger!

(Source: MU)
